category: Athletes’ Committee Regulations/Article 8 (Dismissal of Committee Members)
contents: Article 8 (Dismissal of members) ① If a member falls under any of the following items, elected members may be dismissed through resolution by the committee, and appointed members may be dismissed by the chairman. However, in cases falling under subparagraphs 5 and 6, the employee is naturally deemed to have been dismissed or dismissed. Revised 2019. 1. 31. 1. Deleted 2021. 12. 27. 2. In case of misconduct related to duties 3. In case of failure to comply with obligations under Article 12-2 4. Negligence in duty, loss of dignity or illness 5. If it is deemed unsuitable to be a member due to other reasons 5. If it does not evade despite falling under Article 12 6. If a member submits a resignation letter at its request ② Article 6 (1) and 2 If an athlete representative under paragraph (1) is dismissed as a committee member pursuant to paragraph (1), he/she shall be deemed to have resigned as athlete representative. Revised 2016. 4. 28., 2019. 1. 31.
